attributes.action: Confer a Knighthood upon Ken Dodd
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: One, if not the greatest Entertainers to come out of Liverpool.  A marvellour comedian and a true gentleman who has contributed so much to the Merseyside Community over the years.  He has and still does, work tirelessly in his charitable work.  He has been honoured in the past by his peers and the City of Liverpool.  Its not before time that this 'Legend' should have a Knighthood confered upon him
